Others: Zach Edey was not in the Grizzlies' starting lineup for just the second time this season.
Coach Taylor Jenkins went with Scotty Pippen Jr., Jaylen Wells, Santi Aldama, Jaren Jackson Jr. and Brandon Clarke.
Memphis built a 20-point lead at halftime.
Zach Edey scored 12 points, grabbed 6 rebounds, and had 6 turnovers in 16 minutes of play.
The Grizzlies won 134-89 despite playing without starters such as Ja Morant and Desmond Bane.
